info.brief_description: A tube of Magic Glue spreads mischief wherever it is found.
info.description:
There exists a tube of Magic glue that has the appearance of a tube of industrial glue, and possess certain magical properties.

1. The tube is infinite meaning that it will never run out of glue.
2. Anyone who sees the tube when no one else is around feels compelled to take it.
3. Whoever possess the tube will feel the urge to use the glue, usually on other people sometimes even on themselves, and they will find themselves more likely to be in situations that would make it easier to accomplish this.
4. The bond of the glue is unbreakable and can not be removed through normal means.
5. The bond lasts for a random amount of time ranging from a couple of hours all the way to being permanent.
6. After the glue is used upon inspection one can find how long the glue lasts in the warning section on the tube which is magically updated every time the glue is used.
7. After a time with one person the glue will disappear only to be found by a new person somewhere else.
